stories.title: Rain rules at Old Trafford
stories.subTitle: England v New Zealand, NatWest Series, Old Trafford
stories.summary: Manchester's weather in the last few days has been more akin to the bleak midwinter than the summer solstice that recently passed, and so it came as no surprise when today's opening NatWest Series fixture was abandoned without a ball being bowled
